outputs.output_descr: CPP Namibia:  Adapting to Climate Change through the Improvement of Traditional Crops and Livestock Farming (CPP NAM: CCA). To develop and pilot a range of effective coping mechanisms that assist subsistence farmers in Namibia's North-Central regions to better manage and cope with climate change, including variability such as droughts

project_descr: Country Pilot Partnership Programme Namibia: Adapting to Climate Change through the improvement of traditional crops and livestock farming:  Climate Change Adaptation Sub- Project CPP NAM: CCA
